name: INKTSY
title: THE ARTIST WITH A CAUSE
description: Born in the darkest alleys of the industrial district, she was raised amidst the clamor of forgotten machines and the whispers of a past rebellion. Her real name lost to time, she took on the moniker "Inktsy," a name whispered in fear by the elite and chanted by the oppressed.
lore:
Inktsy's origins are tied to the Sparkball arenas themselves. She grew up watching the sport from the shadows, mesmerized by the skill of the players but disillusioned by the corruption that controlled the game. The rich and powerful used Sparkball not just as entertainment but as a tool of oppression, keeping the masses distracted while they tightened their grip on Dunktown.

But Inktsy refused to be another pawn. She became a symbol of resistance, her identity hidden behind a mask that embodies the forgotten and the voiceless. With a spray can in one hand and a bat in the other, she started a movement, tagging the walls of Dunktown with symbols of rebellion and disrupting Sparkball matches to expose the corrupt underbelly of the sport.
tips:
- Be Agile: Use Inktsy's speed to outmaneuver enemies and strike where they least expect it. Her agility makes her a formidable opponent in quick skirmishes.

- Strategic Tagging: Utilize Inktsy’s tagging ability not only to mark your path but also to disorient and confuse enemies. The symbols can be strategically placed to alter the battlefield.

- Combine Skills: Combine Inktsy's skills for maximum effectiveness. Her ability to tag enemies and disrupt Sparkball matches can create openings for devastating attacks.
lmbDescription: Passive: Inktsy’s rapid strikes apply a 'Ink Splash' effect to enemies. After three hits, the enemy is marked, and Inktsy can unleash a powerful paint burst that slows and damages nearby foes.
rmbDescription: Active: Inktsy performs a high-speed dash that leaves a trail of ink, confusing enemies and reducing their vision. If an enemy is hit by the dash, they are temporarily stunned and take additional damage from subsequent attacks.
qDescription: Active: Inktsy marks an area with a rebellious symbol. Enemies within the marked area receive increased damage from Inktsy’s attacks and have their defenses lowered, making them easier targets for the team.
spcDescription: Ultimate: Inktsy unleashes a powerful wave of rebellious energy, causing a massive explosion of ink that deals damage and disrupts the enemy’s formations. Allies within the blast radius gain a temporary speed boost and reduced cooldowns on their abilities.
rDescription: Ultimate: Inktsy channels the essence of the rebellion, creating an aura that damages and debuffs enemies while enhancing her allies’ combat capabilities. The aura also spreads Inktsy’s symbols, increasing the team's overall effectiveness in combat.

name: Enna
title: FREERUNNING AGENT
description: Enna, a skilled freerunner and agent, is known for her agility and stealth. Raised in the gritty underbelly of a sprawling city, she honed her abilities in the shadows, using her speed and acrobatics to navigate the urban jungle and strike against injustice.
lore:
Enna's journey began as a street kid, learning to survive by dodging and weaving through the city's labyrinthine alleys. Her exceptional skills caught the eye of an underground resistance movement, where she quickly rose to prominence as a key operative.

Her unique blend of agility and stealth made her an invaluable asset in the fight against corruption and tyranny. Now, Enna uses her talents to expose and disrupt the machinations of those who seek to control the city from the shadows.
tips:
- Exploit Agility: Enna’s speed allows her to quickly evade and outmaneuver opponents. Use her agility to gain the upper hand in fast-paced encounters.

- Utilize Verticality: Take advantage of Enna's climbing and leaping abilities to access vantage points and surprise enemies from above.

- Timing is Key: Enna’s skills are most effective when used with precise timing. Plan your moves to maximize the impact of her abilities.
lmbDescription: Passive: Enna’s quick strikes increase her movement speed for a short duration, allowing her to reposition swiftly and strike again.
rmbDescription: Active: Enna performs a rapid roll that grants her temporary invincibility and reduces damage taken. Enemies caught in the roll’s path are pushed back and disoriented.
qDescription: Active: Enna leaps into the air and performs a high-speed descent, slashing at enemies below. Enemies hit by the descent are knocked down and take additional damage from subsequent attacks.
spcDescription: Ultimate: Enna dashes forward, leaving behind a trail of shadowy afterimages. Enemies crossing the trail are slowed and take damage over time. Allies within the trail gain increased movement speed and reduced cooldowns.
rDescription: Ultimate: Enna channels her energy into a series of high-speed strikes that cause massive damage to enemies in her path. Each strike briefly blinds and confuses opponents, giving her and her allies a strategic advantage.

name: Kana
title: CULINARY CONNOISSEUR
description: Kana, a master of the culinary arts, blends her love for cooking with her combat skills. Trained in the art of gourmet cuisine, she uses her expertise to create powerful meals that aid her allies and hinder her enemies.
lore:
Kana’s journey began in a humble kitchen, where she honed her skills in crafting exquisite dishes. Her culinary talents became legendary, and she was soon recruited by a secretive group that used her cooking to enhance their operations.

Kana’s meals are not just for pleasure; they provide vital support in battles, healing allies and weakening foes. With her unique blend of culinary and combat skills, Kana is a formidable force on and off the battlefield.
tips:
- Use Meals Wisely: Kana’s meals provide crucial support. Use them strategically to heal and boost allies, or to debuff enemies.

- Stack the Seasoning: Kana’s attacks apply stacks of seasoning that can be used to prepare powerful meals. Keep track of these stacks to maximize the effectiveness of her abilities.

- Timing is Everything: Kana’s abilities are most effective when used at the right moment. Coordinate with your team to make the most of her support capabilities.
lmbDescription: Passive: Each attack on an enemy applies a stack of 'seasoning.' Upon reaching three stacks, Kana can prepare a dish that heals a nearby ally or herself.
rmbDescription: Active: Kana creates a protective barrier around an ally, infused with her culinary magic. The barrier absorbs damage and provides a small healing effect over time.
qDescription: Active: Kana prepares a lavish feast that grants allies increased health regeneration and resistance to damage for a short period. Enemies who approach the feast take damage and have their defenses reduced.
spcDescription: Ultimate: Kana throws a grand banquet that heals all allies and provides them with a significant boost in attack and defense. Enemies in the area are debuffed and take increased damage from all sources.
rDescription: Ultimate: Kana unleashes a burst of culinary energy, causing a series of explosive food-based attacks that deal heavy damage and apply debuffs to enemies. Allies receive a substantial boost in their combat abilities and health regeneration.
